name: FLAPPY BIRD (itch) (PIXELFOX)
description: FLAPPY BIRD IS A CLASSICAL GAME ORIGINALLY DEVELOPED FOR SMARTPHONES BY DONG NGUYEN ON MAY 24, 2013. THIS IS MY TAKE ON THAT GAME. THIS VERSION INCLUDES LEVELS THAT YOU CAN PASS IMPROVING YOUR HIGH SCORE AND DISCOVERING NEW WORLDS. IN CASE YOU ARE NOT FAMILIAR WITH THE GAMEPLAY, THE INITIATIVE IS TO JUMP BETWEEN THE BLOCKS WITHOUT TOUCHING THEM.
